dict.string:
# If TM_LATEX_MASTER not set use TM_FILEPATH [ -z "$TM_LATEX_MASTER" ] && export TM_LATEX_MASTER="$TM_FILEPATH" export MASTER_BASENAME=`basename -s.tex "$TM_LATEX_MASTER"` cd "`dirname "$TM_LATEX_MASTER"`" rm -f "$MASTER_BASENAME".aux rm -f "$MASTER_BASENAME".pdfsync rm -f "$MASTER_BASENAME".mtc? rm -f "$MASTER_BASENAME".log rm -f "$MASTER_BASENAME".bbl rm -f "$MASTER_BASENAME".aux rm -f "$MASTER_BASENAME".toc rm -f "$MASTER_BASENAME".bmt rm -f ~/Sites/web_kit_workaround.pdf
echo "Done Cleaning up"
